alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:02PM CDT until May 09 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PAWNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN RUSH COUNTIES... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Ash Valley, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Ash Valley around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Larned. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
